function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible presence of microbes in the DBAF root bed.","Impact":"Uncertainty about the role of microbes in VOCs removal and degradation.","Mitigation":"Conduct further study to investigate the type and rate of microbes responsible for VOCs removal.","Technologies":"Laboratory experiments to separate adsorption, absorption, and microbe degradation processes for better understanding.","People":"Researchers, Environmental health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, Environmental health organizations"},{"Description":"Moisture generation due to the use of DBAF.","Impact":"Could affect thermal comfort conditions and indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Monitor and control the moisture production rate to optimize thermal comfort conditions.","Technologies":"Moisture monitoring systems, HVAC controls","People":"Building managers, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building management companies, HVAC service providers"},{"Description":"Reduction in outdoor air supply as a result of DBAF usage.","Impact":"Potential impact on indoor air quality if not managed effectively.","Mitigation":"Monitor indoor air quality and adjust ventilation rates accordingly.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Building owners, Facility managers","Owner":"Facility management companies, Building owners"}]}
